Description: The following statement contains a magic number: using ( Stream input = Console.OpenStandardInput() ) {                  int rc = 0;                  var buf = new byte[512];                  do {                        try {                          rc = input.Read( buf' 0' buf.Length );                          if ( rc > 0 ) {                              debugee.StandardInput.BaseStream.Write( buf' 0' rc );                          }                      } catch {                           rc = 0;                      }                  } while (( !debugee.HasExited ) && rc > 0 );              }
